name: trantor-saas-ai
title: Trantor SaaS / AI
desc: Trantor is an advanced Astro SaaS template specifically designed for AI-driven tech companies and startups
article:
Trantor is a state-of-the-art SaaS template crafted for AI-driven tech companies and startups. Featuring a sleek, minimalist design with a fresh mint color palette, it exudes modernity and simplicity. Its intuitive navigation, responsive layouts, and lightning-fast load speeds ensure a seamless user experience.


This template includes fully customizable components like AI-powered pricing tables, dynamic testimonials, feature showcases, and engaging call-to-action sections, all optimized to spotlight the unique advantages of your AI SaaS product.


Features:

- Features over 11+ pages

- Automatically imports MDX components

- Allows content creation and updates in Markdown or MDX

- OG image support included

- Fully customizable (CSS, Menu Links, Socials, SEO meta tags)

- Responsive design for desktops, tablets, and smartphones

- Built using the Tailwind CSS framework

- SEO-friendly structure

- Custom multi-category dropdown menu


Content / Pages:

- Home (landing page)

- Solution

- How it works

- Pricing (& comparison table)

- Integrations

- Changelog

- Sign Up & Sign In

- Careers

- Blog

- About Us

- Terms And Conditions
